Description: You swing your arms around violently, attacking anything within a 10 foot circle, centered on yourself. All creatures in range must make a DEX saving throw against your Move DC, taking dark damage on a failure, or half as much on a success.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
